Dialogue.Page: Callis's Thesis is a mod made for the third mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community, about a Nomai who needs your help finishing their contribution to an upcoming festival.
The mod doesn't have much puzzles, but is appreciated by many for its humor. Even as a small entry, Callis's Thesis has its strengths.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
